generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and tram tracks, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the image, adjacent to the road, with a bicycle parked on it and a curb separating it from the road.
- building: There are multi-story buildings with windows and architectural details visible on the left side of the image.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are visible along the right side of the road and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible in the upper part of the image, appearing clear and blue.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible on the right side of the image, mounted on a pole.
- traffic sign: A triangular "yield" sign and a circular "straight ahead" sign are visible on the right side of the image, mounted on a pole.
- car: Several cars are visible in the image, including a black car in the foreground and a silver car on the left side of the road.
- bus: A white and orange tram (a type of train) is visible in the background, traveling on the tracks.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- pole: Several poles are visible in the image, including those supporting traffic lights and traffic signs.
- person: A person is visible inside the silver car on the left side of the image.
- rider: A person is visible riding a bicycle on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
